attributes.action: Illegalise children playing 18 rated video games.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned hereby demand stricter regulations on 18 restricted video games.
In detail we want that no person/s under the age of 16 is permitted to play video games that are rated 18 under any and all of the rating systems used in the UK under any circumstance.
We also call on the government to criminalise the act of a responsible adult (parent, guardian, sibling etc. Over the age of 18) letting a child under the age of 16 to play or watch another person play video games restricted to the adult gaming community. (Games rated 18+)
